gjs-css: * { box-sizing: border-box; } body {margin: 0;}#iepbu6{width:520px;background-color:#fff;border:1px solid #ddd;id:iepbu6;}#i97ydg{background-color:#00D2C2;padding-bottom:20px;id:i97ydg;}#irocgl{font-size:28px;align:center;color:#fff;line-height:1.2em;font-weight:300;font-family:Helvetica, serif;id:irocgl;}#ivykpb{padding-top:20px;padding-left:20px;padding-right:20px;padding-bottom:20px;id:ivykpb;}#iyrzou{align:center;font-size:32px;font-family:Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif;color:#444;font-weight:200;height:auto;padding-top:0;padding-bottom:0;line-height:28px;id:iyrzou;}#ifkjb4{font-size:16px;font-family:Helvetica, serif;color:#8e9197;align:center;font-weight:100;line-height:1.6em;id:ifkjb4;}#iqr2lh{font-size:20px;font-family:Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif;color:#00D2C2;font-weight:600;align:center;text-decoration:none;padding-left:20px;padding-right:20px;padding-top:20px;padding-bottom:20px;border:1px dashed #ddd;id:iqr2lh;}#illb0m{font-size:16px;font-family:Helvetica, serif;color:#8e9197;align:center;font-weight:100;line-height:1.6em;id:illb0m;}#inzarj{href:https://www.campaignrabbit.com/;border:2px #00D2C2 ##00D2C2;background-color:#00D2C2;font-size:16px;id:inzarj;font-family:Trebuchet MS, Helvetica, sans-serif;}#ij2wuk{font-family:Helvetica, serif;color:#8e9197;align:center;font-weight:100;line-height:1.6em;id:ij2wuk;}#i1emrj{background-color:#EAECED;id:i1emrj;}#i1pog1{align:center;color:rgb(157, 160, 168);text-decoration:none;id:i1pog1;}#outlook a{padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;}.ExternalClass *{line-height:100%;}body{margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;text-size-adjust:100%;}table, td{border-collapse:collapse;}img{border-top-color:initial;border-top-style:initial;border-top-width:0px;border-right-color:initial;border-right-style:initial;border-right-width:0px;border-bottom-color:initial;border-bottom-style:initial;border-bottom-width:0px;border-left-color:initial;border-left-style:initial;border-left-width:0px;border-image-outset:initial;border-image-repeat:initial;border-image-slice:initial;border-image-source:initial;border-image-width:initial;height:auto;line-height:100%;outline-color:initial;outline-style:none;outline-width:initial;text-decoration-line:none;text-decoration-style:initial;text-decoration-color:initial;}p{display:block;margin-top:13px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:13px;margin-left:0px;}
gjs-html:
We Thank You for being our Customer..

EXTRA 20% OFF

Here’s your Couponcode. Hurry! ENDS 8/24

WELCOME2018

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Visit the Store

Or do something else here

Copyright © 2018 CampaignRabbit
Unsubscribe
